comments.notes: I'm purposely trying to make this near turing complete or as close to it as possible so that I don't need to update ALPACA anymore, especially since I resetted my computer and lost all the C# files making it harder to make stuff again
comments.aboutmainpointer: This returns a ID's siblings. <versionvalue.value> would look for the ID 'versionvalue' and then look at its sibling, 'value' and return 'value's value
comments.aboutvar-return: This returns a function's variable's value based on name. [varname] would return the parameter varname
comments.about-cx-cy: cx and cy stand for Childed X and Childed Y, if UI's parent's X and Y are at X 300, and Y 50 then having a CX and CY of 0 would still have it at the x 300, and 50 but having a CX of 20 would make it x 320, and y 50
comments.about-ax-ay: ax and ay stand for absolute x and y, whatever you put makes it go at that position.
